etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an object is out-of-date.

createdOn.description: The date this object was created.
createdOn.title: Created On

modifiedOn.description: The date this object was last modified.
modifiedOn.title: Modified On

createdBy.description: The user that created this object.
createdBy.title: Created By

modifiedBy.description: The user that last modified this object.
modifiedBy.title: Modified By

requirementId.description: The ID of the Access Requirement that this object approves.

requirementVersion.description: The version of the Access Requirement that this object approves.

researchProjectId.description: The research project that this object approves.

accessorId.description: The ID of the principal (user or group) approved for access
accessorId.title: Accessor

concreteType.description: Indicates which implementation of AccessApproval this object represents.
